languages.text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by the Executioner's damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers have been applied.
languages.original_text: После применения {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Карнавал страданий{/g}, до конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 100% после применения других модификаторов. Этот эффект суммируется и может быть применен несколькими {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачами{/g}.

traits.locale_text: All enemies in combat are immediately affected by Bleed (Level / 10), Burn (Level / 10) and Toxin (Level / 10).
Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by the Executioner's damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers.

All enemies in combat immediately suffer bleeding <u>(Executioner's level / 10)</u>, burning <u>(Executioner's level / 10)</u>, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} <u>(Executioner's level / 10)</u>.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by the Executioner's damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers have been applied.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by the Executioner's damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers have been applied.

All enemies in combat immediately suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. The level of each effect is equal to <u>(character's level / 10)</u>.

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que infligen los efectos de daño continuado del ejecutor a los enemigos aumenta un +100 % después de aplicar todos los demás modificadores.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by the Executioner's damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers have been applied.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que infligen los efectos de daño continuado del ejecutor a los enemigos aumenta un +100 % después de aplicar todos los demás modificadores.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の継続効果による敵への{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、他のすべての修正の後に+100%増加する。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by the Executioner's damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中の敵全体は即座に{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}状態になる。各効果のレベルは<u>(キャラクターのレベル / 10)</u>になる。

languages.text: 所有由行刑者的持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果造成的伤害，当所有伤害系数结算完成之后，会再额外提高100%伤害。此效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by the Executioner's damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers have been applied.

traits.locale_text: 所有由行刑者的持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果造成的伤害，当所有伤害系数结算完成之后，会再额外提高100%伤害。此效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller durch den Henker verursachten Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte nach allen anderen Modifikatoren um +100 %.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by the Executioner's damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers have been applied.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller durch den Henker verursachten Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte nach allen anderen Modifikatoren um +100 %.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés aux ennemis par les effets de dégâts progressifs de l'exécuteur sont augmentés de +100 % une fois tous les autres modificateurs appliqués.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by the Executioner's damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers have been applied.

languages.text: До конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} палача увеличивается на 100% после применения других модификаторов.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by the Executioner's damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} палача увеличивается на +100% после применения других модификаторов.

На всех противников в бою немедленно накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}. Уровень каждого из эффектов равен <u>(уровень персонажа / 10)</u>.
До конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} палача увеличивается на +100% после применения других модификаторов.
До конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} палача увеличивается на 100% после применения других модификаторов.

languages.text: Cellat'ın zamanla hasar veren etkileri sebebiyle düşmanlara verilen tüm {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarlar{/g}, diğer tüm değiştiriciler uygulandıktan sonra +%100 artar. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
